snippet: Educational institutions, teachers and students have been targeted despite legal protections of gender equality, a report finds.
abstract: United Nations issues report showing that worldwide increase in violence at schools where girls are seeking access to education, despite legal protections of gender equality; report finds evidence of attacks in at least 70 countries between 2009 and 2014.
